channel.title: Change Server IP
channel.description: Hey guys, currently changing my vps soon. Wanted to update my IP to a no-ip if possible before hand. Couldn't find it on the toplist edit was wondering how to do this...

item.title: Change Server IP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“High105, post:3, topic:545512”][quote author=Newty link=topic=664397.msg4441441#msg4441441 date=1406768249]
I don’t think you can change your IP after its been posted. You need to delete your old advertisement and post another one.
[/quote]
Thanks for informing me!
All I have to do is register a “new vote page” on the toplist to do so?[/quote]
idk if they’re a way to actually delete it, so you’ll sadly have to wait until it drops down to below 40%.

Alternatively, if you asked Moparisthebest super nicely, he may change it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Server IP
item.dc:creator: @High105 High105
item.description:
@High105 wrote:

Newty:

I don’t think you can change your IP after its been posted. You need to delete your old advertisement and post another one.

Thanks for informing me!
All I have to do is register a “new vote page” on the toplist to do so?
